title: Where is the weapon effect for PROJECT: ZED??

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
The gyazo link is a short .gif from SkinSpotlights video on PROJECT: ZED, and I noticed that his weapons have this yellow-ish tint glowing from it. However, when I test the skin in-game, the weapons look like plain red plastic. The following gyazo link is a screenshot of my zed with no effects on blades. I also have maxed settings.

https://gyazo.com/08b3cd30e99b316555719b8f8537f947

Without this weapon effect, the weapons look quite plain and bad.

I also observed other videos to see if the effects are there as well, there are plenty that do, and some that don't.
Did this skin get "down-graded" or am I missing a special graphic setting?
{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Still can not find the reason... Considering refunding.

The skin hasn't been downgraded as far as I know, but I'm wondering if you've tried adjusting both Character Quality and Effects Quality in the video settings? I know you mentioned having max settings, but double check those two specifically.

They are definitely both at very high.
Adjusted many times.
Even reinstalled the game...
